quote: LinkedIn is truly still the last social media outlet out there that's entirely based on selling and business and relationship building.
why_clipworthy: It challenges the perception of LinkedIn as just a professional networking site.
suggested_hook: Think LinkedIn is just for resumes? Think again!

quote: You want to stand out. You want to really scare somebody. Do the audio feature instead.
why_clipworthy: Provides a specific tactic that can immediately differentiate an agent from the competition.
